0.name: Outside the Guild Hall of the Silver Circle

1.name: Main Entry Hall
desc: This is the entry hall to the guild.  Adorning the white marble walls are
tapestries, and paintings of famous members of the guild.  You see a marble
staircase leading up to a landing.  To the north you hear the sound of a
fountain.

2.name: Lovely Courtyard
desc: This spacious courtyard is paved with irregulaly shaped slate stones.
Within the courtyard there are many trees and flowers all arranged neatly
in planters. There are numerous benches to sit and enjoy the beauty of
this place.  In the center of the courtyard is a fountain that is
pouring forth bountiful amounts of water.

4.name: A Cozy Living Room
desc: You see a cozy living room with a hardwood floor.  A warm fire burns in a
fireplace in the east wall, which will keep you warm as you relax in
a fine couch made of fine white velvet.  Hanging over the fireplace is
a painting of a girl with black hair sitting in her mother's lap holding
a white kitten.

5.name: Guild Rest Area
desc: You find yourself in the Silver Circle rest area.  Relaxing couches are
scattered about with members resting their tired bones in them.  They
are arranged around a mystical portal through which you can watch the
action in the latest arena, or catch the latest debates about how the
guild should be run.  To the east through a stone portal you can see
wispy tendrils of steam billowing forth.  You hear the sounds of laughter
and merriment coming from within.

6.name: Grudge Match Waiting Room
6.desc: Here you see people lined up to participate in grudge matches.

8.name: Guild Reception
desc: You see the receptionist's office for the guild.  It as a small room
paneled in darkly stained cherry, matching the cherry desk behind which
sits the receptionist-- a very talented person.  She handles all the
affairs of the guild and can even arrange for you to rent from here

11.name: Guildmaster's Office
desc: You have entered the office of Shadowind, guildmaster of the guild.
As you walk in, you see a large, oval-shaped room gilded in gold, silver,
and blue with a large window on the western side of the room.  Through the
window you see a breathtaking view of the surrounding countryside.  A
large, curved, mahogany desk sits in front of the window.  The room is
carpeted in a light blue trimmed with gold and containing the Great Seal
of the Silver Circle on the ground directly in front of the desk.  Hanging
on the walls are tapestries and mounted in the center is a portrait of the
guild's patron goddess, the Countess of the Silver Circle.

12.name: A Lavish Bedroom
desc: You see a magnificent bedroom with a large bed lined up in the middle
of the north wall of the room.  The bed is covered with deep blue coverings
which are trimmed with silver.  The comforter is embroidered with abstract--
yet somehow beautiful images that seem to shift constantly before your
eyes.  At the foot of the bed you see a lovely chest.
You see a finely crafted hope chest made of several types of wood,
primarily walnut.  The other woods are inlaid into the pattern of
a rose.

13.name: Outside a Stately Apartment
desc: You stand on a landing at the top of the staircase.  To the east is a large
mahagony door.

14.name: Soothing Hottub
desc: You are in a room tiled from floor to ceiling.  Against a background of white
tiles are lovely geometric patterns of alternating blue and purple tiles.  In
the eastern half of the room is a basin of dark blue tiles filled with bubbling
inviting waters.

15.name: A Nicely Decorated Office
desc: You are in a spacious yet not oversized office.  The floor is oak parquet and
a persian floor rug covers the area in the southern part of the room. On the
rug is a black onyx desk, carved from a single chunk of the stone.  Inlayed
into the center of the work surface is a large circle pattern-- the symbol of
the guild.  Scattered on the desk are reimbursal requests, arena consent forms,
zone design proposals and other various vestages of an overworked Goddess.
Behind the desk filling almost the entire wall is a window, which looks out over
a beautiful countryside.  In the far distance you can see snowcapped mountains
and a large forest.  Closer by, a herd of unicorns can be seen frolicking in a
grassy field.

25.name: Grudge Match Room
25.desc: This is a room for players to settle their differences.
